00031 public class SimulinkEcoreCreator {
00032         
00033         protected SimulinkFactory factory; 
00034         protected Model theModel;       
00035         protected HashMap<String, System> systemRepository;     
00036         protected HashMap<UUID, ProtoObject> repository;        
00042         public SimulinkEcoreCreator(SimulinkFactory aFactory) {
00043                 factory = aFactory;
00044                 systemRepository        = new HashMap<String, System>();
00045                 repository                      = new HashMap<UUID, ProtoObject>();
00046         }
00047 
00053         public Model newModel(String modelName) {
00054                 theModel = factory.createModel();
00055                 theModel.setName( modelName );
00056                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( theModel );
00057                 return theModel;
00058         }
00059 
00065         private void setUUIDAndAddToRepository(ProtoObject object) {
00066                 UUID uuid = UUID.randomUUID();
00067                 object.setUuid(uuid.toString());
00068                 repository.put(uuid, object);
00069         }
00070 
00071 
00075         public Model getTopElement() {
00076                 return theModel;
00077         }
00078 
00079 
00087         public System addRootSystem(String name) {
00088                 System aSystem = obtainSystem(name);
00089                 theModel.setRoot(aSystem);
00090                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( aSystem );              
00091                 return aSystem;
00092         }

00099         private System obtainSystem(String name) {
00100                 System aSystem = findSystem( name );
00101                 if ( aSystem == null ) {
00102                         aSystem = newSystem(name);
00103                 }
00104                 return aSystem;
00105         }
00106 
00107 
00113         private System newSystem(String name) {
00114                 System aSystem = factory.createSystem();
00115                 aSystem.setName(name);
00116                 aSystem.setSimulinkName(name);
00117                 systemRepository.put(name, aSystem);
00118                 theModel.getParts().add(aSystem);
00119                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( aSystem );              
00120                 return aSystem;
00121         }
00122 
00127         public System findSystem(String name) {
00128                 return systemRepository.get( name );
00129         }
00130 
00138         public static Port findPortWithin(String portName, System aSystem) {
00139                 Port port = findOutportWithin(portName, aSystem);
00140                 if ( port == null ) {
00141                         port = findInportWithin(portName, aSystem);
00142                 }
00143                 return port;
00144         }
00145         
00149         public static Outport findOutportWithin(String portName, System aSystem) {
00150                 Outport port = null;
00151                 EList<System> targetSystems = 
00152                         createSystemListWithParentAndFirstLevelChldren(aSystem);
00153                 for (System sys : targetSystems ) {
00154                                 port = findOutportInSystem( portName, sys );
00155                                 if (port != null) { return port; }
00156                 }
00157                 return port;
00158         }
00159 
00163         public static Inport findInportWithin(String portName, System aSystem) {
00164                 Inport port = null;
00165                 EList<System> targetSystems = 
00166                         createSystemListWithParentAndFirstLevelChldren(aSystem);
00167                 for (System sys : targetSystems ) {
00168                                 port = findInportInSystem( portName, sys );
00169                                 if (port != null) { return port; }
00170                 }
00171                 return port;
00172         }
00173 
00178         private static EList<System> createSystemListWithParentAndFirstLevelChldren(
00179                         System aSystem) {
00180                 EList<SystemReference> childrenList = aSystem.getChildren();
00181                 EList<System> targetSystems = getAllTargets( childrenList );
00182                 targetSystems.add(aSystem);
00183                 return targetSystems;
00184         }
00185 
00186 
00187         private static EList<System> getAllTargets(EList<SystemReference> childrenList) {
00188                 BasicEList<System> result = new BasicEList<System>( childrenList.size() );
00189                 for (SystemReference aRef : childrenList) {
00190                         result.add( aRef.getTarget() );
00191                 }
00192                 return result;
00193         }
00194 
00195 
00196         private static Outport findOutportInSystem(String portName, System aSystem) {
00197                 return findPortInList( portName, aSystem.getOutports());
00198         }
00199 
00200         private static Inport findInportInSystem(String portName, System aSystem) {
00201                 return findPortInList( portName, aSystem.getInports());
00202         }
00203         
00204         private static <IOPort extends Port> IOPort findPortInList(String portName, 
00205                         EList<IOPort> ports) {
00206                 for (IOPort aPort : ports) {
00207                         if (aPort.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(portName)) {
00208                                 return aPort;
00209                         }
00210                 }
00211                 return null;
00212         }

00214         
00223         public SystemReference addSystem(PropertyList pList) {          
00224                 
00225                 String name             = pList.getName();
00226                 String instanceName = pList.getInstanceName();
00227                 System parent           = pList.getParent();
00228                 SystemReference sysRef = addSystemInstance(name, parent, instanceName);         
00229                 return sysRef;
00230         }
00231         
00239         private SystemReference addSystemInstance(String name, System parent,
00240                         String instanceName) {
00241                 
00242                 System aSystem = obtainSystem(name);
00243                 SystemReference reference = factory.createSystemReference();
00244                 reference.setName(instanceName);
00245                 reference.setParent(parent);
00246                 reference.setTarget(aSystem);
00247                 parent.getChildren().add(reference);
00248                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( reference );            
00249                 return reference;
00250         }
00251 
00252 
00253         @Deprecated
00254         public System addSystem(String name, System parent, String instanceName) {
00255                 SystemReference sysRef = addSystemInstance(name, parent, instanceName);
00256                 return sysRef.getTarget();
00257         }
00258         
00259         /*
00260          * name and instanceName are the same
00261          */
00262         @Deprecated
00263         public System addSystem(String name, System parent) {
00264                 return addSystem(name, parent, name);
00265         }

00274         public Inport addInPort(String name, System parent) {
00275                 Inport inport = factory.createInport();
00276                 parent.getInports().add( inport );
00277                 inport.setName(name);
00278                 inport.setParent(parent);
00279                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( inport );               
00280                 return inport;
00281         }
00282 
00289         public Outport addOutPort(String name, System parent) {
00290                 Outport outport = factory.createOutport();
00291                 parent.getOutports().add( outport );
00292                 outport.setName(name);
00293                 outport.setParent(parent);
00294                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( outport );              
00295                 return outport;
00296         }

00307         public Line addLineBetween(String lineName, System source, System destination, 
00308                         System parent) {
00309                 Outport outport = source.getOutports().get(0);
00310                 Inport inport = destination.getInports().get(0);
00311                 return addLine(lineName, outport, inport, parent);
00312         }
00313         
00322         public Line addLine(String lineName, Port source, Port destination, 
00323                         System parent) {
00324                 Line line = factory.createLine();
00325                 line.setName(lineName);
00326                 line.setSource(source);
00327                 line.setDestination(destination);
00328                 parent.getLines().add(line);
00329                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( line );
00330                 return line;
00331         }
00332         
00340         public void addLines(ArrayList<LineInfo> lines) throws PortNotFoundException {
00341                 String name;
00342                 Port srcPort, dstPort;
00343                 System parent;
00344                 for ( LineInfo lineInfo : lines ) {
00345                         name = lineInfo.getName();
00346                         parent = lineInfo.getLineParent();
00347                         srcPort = this.findPort( lineInfo.getSrcPort() );
00348                         dstPort = this.findPort( lineInfo.getDstPort() );                       
00349                         addLine( name, srcPort, dstPort, parent );
00350                 }
00351         }

00355                 return (System) repository.get(uuid);

00359                 return (SystemReference) repository.get(uuid);
00360         }

00363                 return (Port) repository.get(uuid);
00364         }
00365                 
00366         public Line findLine(UUID uuid) {
00367                 return (Line) repository.get(uuid);
